name: Dog-Gone-It
description:
CONTROLS:

- 'WASD' for movement

- Shift for sprint

- Space for jump (Owner control)

- 'Q' for character swap

- Left-Click for punching air

DESCRIPTION:

Dog-Gonnit! Your dog is lost in the woods, and you must find him! Search for him as the owner, and then help guide your owner to the rescue by altering terrain as the dog. Cooperate between the owner and dog to overcome unnavigable terrain, and find the pup's big red ball!
